document.full_text: banks will be forced to keep some risk when they securitize all but the most conservatively written mortgages under rules that regulators are expected to vote on tuesday, the new york times reported on monday.
document.title: regulators to vote on mortgage securities rules: report
lines_and_colors: banks will be forced to keep some risk when they securitize all but the most conservatively written mortgages under rules that regulators are expected to vote on tuesday, the new york times reported on monday.
